In the movie 'Student of the Year 2' (2019), what is the relationship between Suryansh Kapoor and Rohan Sachdev?
Options:
A. Suryansh Kapoor is Rohan Sachdev's father.
B. Suryansh Kapoor is Rohan Sachdev's best friend.
C. Suryansh Kapoor plays a 15-year old version of Rohan Sachdev.
D. Rohan Sachdev is Suryansh Kapoor's rival.
Correct Answer: Suryansh Kapoor plays a 15-year old version of Rohan Sachdev.
